text: Boba Fett is a fictional character in the Star Wars universe. In The Empire Strikes Back and Return of the Jedi, he is a bounty hunter hired by Darth Vader. He was also added briefly to the earlier movie A New Hope when the movie was digitally remastered. In Attack of the Clones, it tells his origin as an unaltered clone of the bounty hunter Jango Fett raised as his son. His aura of danger and mystery has created a cult following for the character. Boba Fett is later seen on the Disney+ series, The Mandalorian. The spin off series, Boba Fett is about his life on Tatooine after the events of Return of the Jedi. On the two Disney+ series, he is played by New Zealand actor, Temuera Morrison. ==References== ==Other websites== * at StarWars.com * Meet Boba Fett â€“ screen-test footage of the prototype Boba Fett costume * Boba Fett fan club Category:Fictional characters introduced in 1978 Category:Star Wars characters
title: Boba Fett
